common.price_interval: Interval for Grabbing Updated Prices from poe.ninja

mods.fungle: Natural inhabitants of this area have been removed

gianna.objective2: Good! Now rush to the exit!
gianna.objective4: Hope you're not waiting for applause!
gianna.perception1: I know set dressing when I see it.
gianna.perception4: Something about this doesn't ring true... Hmm.
gianna.perception5: It'd be easier to see with proper stage lighting...
gianna.perception6: All that time squinting at cue cards has trained me for this.
gianna.deception1: Back in line, soldier! I will inspect!
gianna.deception2: Did I say you could speak? Let me do this.
gianna.deception3: Quiet. ... See? Nothing. I'll show you.
gianna.deception4: Are you drunk, soldier?! There's nothing on the other side.
gianna.deception5: Stay in formation! This is a drill!
gianna.deception6: Obey your orders! I'll take point!
gianna.smuggler1: I didn't hear nothin', but let's see.
gianna.smuggler2: Oi, keep it down. Gettin' each other spooked. Here, I'll prove it.
gianna.smuggler3: Don't be so paranoid. Look, nothing's here...
gianna.smuggler4: You're just drunk, mate. Watch, it'll be empty.
gianna.smuggler5: Probably just the rats. Afraid of rats? Let's find out!
gianna.smuggler6: Nah, you're just losin' it. How could anything be here?
gianna.cultist1: Ease off the elixir. Nothing is here. Observe.
gianna.cultist2: The fumes are affecting your judgement. I shall prove it.
gianna.cultist3: Likely a mere apparition, but I'll make sure.
gianna.cultist4: Perhaps you should rest. I'll check for you.
gianna.cultist5: A hallucinatory phenomena. Anything you see is, as well.
gianna.cultist6: Hearing things is a known side effect, but just to be sure...
gianna.perceptionloud4: I know there's something wrong here, just need a bit of time!
gianna.perceptionloud5: A lot of work went into hiding something here!
gianna.perceptionloud6: Some convincing fakes here! What are they hiding!?
gianna.deceptionloud1: Open it! Let them through! Oh, I'll do it!
gianna.deceptionloud2: Stand back! I'll take them on single handedly!
gianna.deceptionloud3: Make way! I must let the reinforcements in!
gianna.deceptionloud4: Give passage! I have a plan!
gianna.deceptionloud6: I'll open the passage, and you take them alive!
gianna.busy2: I need to finish this first.
gianna.busy3: You can't rush a good performance.
gianna.interrupt2: Hey, you're hindering a great performance.
gianna.combatstart2: We're just looking around, I swear!
gianna.combatend3: Saw that ending coming a mile away.
gianna.loot2: That gives me an idea for a character.
gianna.loot5: You've a keen eye for pretty little things, don't you?
gianna.alert1: Shh. We don't want an audience.
gianna.alert2: Keep it down. There's a lot left to do.
gianna.alert3: Quiet, or we'll have to end early.
gianna.alert4: This is far more tense than I like.
gianna.final1: And there, before her, was everything she wanted...
gianna.final2: They were so close, they could almost taste it.
gianna.final3: In most plays, this is where I'd double-cross you. ... I-... I'm not going to double-cross you.
gianna.final4: This is what we're here for. Go on.
gianna.final5: Well? Don't keep the audience waiting!
gianna.interruptloud3: Do something or this will take forever!
gianna.combatstartloud2: Let us through, or face your death!
gianna.combatendloud2: It's like they forget they're the villains! Wait... Are they the villains? No, yeah, they're the villains.
gianna.lootloud1: Make sure that's not a posthumous award!
gianna.lootloud2: Great find, but shouldn't we be leaving!?
gianna.lootloud4: Don't be blinded by all that glitters!
gianna.lootloud5: Wrap it up! I don't want this to be my final role!
gianna.finalloud3: Get it! I can't handle the suspense!
gianna.finalloud4: It's there! Grab it while we can!
gianna.finalloud5: We're so close! The tension is palpable!

huck.lockpick1: Standard issue lock. Shouldn't be too difficult.
huck.lockpick6: Ought to be able to open it.
huck.brute6: Looks heavy, but not too heavy.
huck.demolition4: Stand back, this won't be pretty.
huck.demolition6: Careful. Need to blow it up.
huck.busy4: I've got to finish this task first.
huck.interrupt4: Can't finish my task like this.
huck.combatstart5: Got a fight on our hands.
huck.alert3: Shh, we're making too much noise.
huck.final5: Go get the target. I've got you.
huck.bruteloud4: Gods, reckon I can handle it!
huck.lootloud1: Don't put me at risk for this!

tibbs.forcing4: Lemme jus' get this outta the way for ya.
tibbs.forcing6: Oh, I'm going to be sore tomorrow.
tibbs.demolition4: If it ain't broke, it will be...
tibbs.demolition5: This one might take a bit, but we'll get there.
tibbs.demolition6: I think it'd look better in pieces too.
tibbs.busy2: In the middle of something here.
tibbs.busy5: When I'm done with this, yeah?
tibbs.combatstart4: Hate this part of the job.
tibbs.combatstart5: You're gonna be sorry. Then I'm gonna be sorry.
tibbs.combatend1: Right, well, carry on I guess.
tibbs.loot3: Now who just leaves something like that lying around?
tibbs.loot5: Oh, know a girl who'd love that.
tibbs.alert2: I'm gettin' a bad feeling, mate.
tibbs.alert3: Reckon we're cutting it close now.
tibbs.alert4: Right, we gotta make tracks soon.
tibbs.final1: Think this might be what we're after.
tibbs.final3: Right, let's nab it and go.
tibbs.final4: Here we go. Make it quick.
tibbs.forcingloud5: I'll do my best, but damn!
tibbs.forcingloud6: I'm taking the longest, bubbliest damn bath after this!
tibbs.demolitionloud6: This is gonna leave a mark!
tibbs.interruptloud1: I can't work under these conditions!
tibbs.combatstartloud5: "Go on Tibbs, you're a big guy!"
tibbs.combatendloud2: Part of the job. Part of the job.
tibbs.lootloud2: Better be worth the delay, mate!
tibbs.lootloud4: Your greed better not get us killed!
tibbs.finalloud4: That's our mark! Grab it and go!

vinderi.objective4: Go on then! Make a path!
vinderi.vault3: Let's pop this little sucker open.
vinderi.vault5: Haven't come across this make before. Well, let's give it a go.
vinderi.vault6: Ooh. Solidly built. Open up to me. It's okay, be vulnerable.
vinderi.engineering1: Now, how do I work this thing again?
vinderi.engineering3: You don't expect me to jump, do you?
vinderi.engineering4: I have the thing for this somewhere...
vinderi.engineering5: I did bring the thing. Did I? Thought I did...
vinderi.engineering6: I was hoping I wouldn't have to remember how to use this blasted thing
vinderi.dismantle1: Ah, clever. Not clever enough, but still.
vinderi.dismantle2: Not the worst trap. Not the best, but not the worst.
vinderi.dismantle4: Oh, those clever bastards. Hmm. Hmmmmmm.
vinderi.dismantle5: Easy pe--...oh. Oh no. Oh? Oh.
vinderi.dismantle6: Huh. Looks like a twist on a Maloney design.
vinderi.demolition5: Yes, yes... I have just the thing!
vinderi.demolition6: I've been saving this one just for you.
vinderi.vaultloud4: "Vinderi, you're not busy running for your life are you?!"
vinderi.vaultloud5: You're insane, you know that, right?!
vinderi.vaultloud6: I don't work well under pressure!
vinderi.engineeringloud2: How in the--... oh! Found it!
vinderi.engineeringloud4: You have the thing!? Wait, I have the thing!
vinderi.engineeringloud5: Ah! I've got the thing for this! Here we go--no, that's not it. AH! Here we go!
vinderi.engineeringloud6: A gap! I have just the tool for this. Somewhere. Did I drop it? Ha! I was holding it! Don't you just hate that?!
vinderi.dismantleloud1: This is meant to be DELICATE work!
vinderi.dismantleloud2: The whole place is a damnable death trap!
vinderi.dismantleloud3: Wait! This thing's rigged to kill us!
vinderi.dismantleloud4: Gods! You were planning to blunder into this thing!
vinderi.dismantleloud5: Trap! Trap! Stop! There's a trap! A trap!
vinderi.dismantleloud6: This is exactly the sort of thing we should have handled earlier!
vinderi.demolitionloud2: Can't even take the time to enjoy this!
vinderi.demolitionloud4: If I die, I hope this blows you up too!
vinderi.demolitionloud5: Gods, these are NOT ideal conditions for handling explosive materials!
vinderi.demolitionloud6: I wanted to save this one for a special occasion. You owe me a new bomb!
vinderi.busy4: Oh, sure, rush the guy with the bombs.
vinderi.busy5: "It was all going so well, then Vinderi blew us all up because I got impatient."
vinderi.interrupt1: Pick on someone your own age.
vinderi.interrupt3: Stop hitting me, you nitwit. I have BOMBS.
vinderi.interrupt4: Idiot's trying to blow us both up!
vinderi.combatstart1: I'm old, but you'll still die sooner!
vinderi.combatend2: Whew, that gets the ol' heart racing.
vinderi.loot2: That, my friend, is very expensive looking.
vinderi.loot4: In my younger days I'd fight you for that.
vinderi.loot5: Bit of advice: keep that little find to yourself.
vinderi.alert2: We're going to get found out if we're not careful.
vinderi.alert3: When even I think we're too loud, that's a problem.
vinderi.final2: Well, go on then. That's what we're here for.
vinderi.final4: We've made it this far. Why stop now?
vinderi.interruptloud3: Not like this! Not like this!
vinderi.interruptloud4: Help! I'm too young to die!
vinderi.lootloud1: Why are you still grabbing things!?
vinderi.lootloud2: Can't use it if you're dead!
vinderi.lootloud5: Great, now you got more loot than brains!
vinderi.finalloud3: There it is! What are you waiting for?!
vinderi.finalloud5: If you don't get it now, you don't get it at all!

tullina.agility5: Okay, Tullina, just like you practised.
tullina.disarm1: I see what they've done here...
tullina.lockpick4: This might take some time, okay?
tullina.lockpick5: I can do it, but it won't be quick.
tullina.busy3: Perhaps you should've planned this better.
tullina.busy4: I can't be in two places at once.
tullina.interrupt1: If I wasn't busy you'd be dead.
tullina.interrupt3: I can't work while I'm being attacked.
tullina.combatstart2: We've got a fight on our hands.
tullina.combatstart3: You want to dance? Let's dance.
tullina.combatend4: We have a job to do.
tullina.loot3: Good find, but don't lose focus.
tullina.loot5: Not bad. Not bad at all.
tullina.alert3: Clumsy work is going to get us caught.
tullina.alert4: Messy. I don't like where this is headed.
tullina.final1: We're here, but it isn't over yet.
tullina.final2: Good. Now, take it and get ready to run.
tullina.final3: Ready? This is where it gets hairy.
tullina.final5: That's the mark. You got it?
tullina.agilityloud5: This is what you've been training for!
tullina.agilityloud6: Fine, but you should know I hold grudges!
tullina.disarmloud3: I think I've got this one figured out!
tullina.disarmloud4: Even without this racket, it'd take me a while...!
tullina.disarmloud5: I'll be as quick as I can, but that still won't be quick.
tullina.disarmloud6: Wish we'd sorted this before we had to run!
tullina.lockpickloud4: This is going to take some time!
tullina.lockpickloud5: Just keep us safe while I work!
tullina.lockpickloud6: You just make sure we're all still alive when I'm done.
tullina.combatstartloud4: You must not value your lives!
tullina.lootloud1: If we die because you slowed us down, I'll kill you!
tullina.lootloud3: Fine, but we have to keep moving!
tullina.lootloud4: You're pushing it! Not in a good way!
tullina.lootloud5: The stealing was meant to happen earlier!
tullina.finalloud4: We're not done yet! Grab it!
tullina.finalloud5: Get it! Now! What a mess...

nenet.perception4: Allow me a moment to focus...
nenet.perception5: Seeing sometimes relies on more than one's eyes.
nenet.thaumaturgy4: I'll crack their minds like so many rhoa eggs.
nenet.thaumaturgy5: I can almost hear their thoughts...
nenet.thaumaturgy6: Isla says the mind is just another system of gears...
nenet.busy3: I'll be with you in a moment.
nenet.busy4: I hear you, but cannot yet.
nenet.combatstart5: Fight together and we shall overcome!
nenet.combatend1: Today is not the end, then.
nenet.combatend2: I knew we could do it.
nenet.loot1: Take what you can. Live for now.
nenet.loot3: I hope you will share that.
nenet.lootloud2: Should we really delay like this?
nenet.alert3: We can ill afford any more mistakes.
nenet.alert4: They will catch on to our presence.
nenet.final2: Do you remember what to do?
nenet.final3: If you need help, I am here.

isla.engineer4: The axles and the gears go 'round and 'round...
isla.engineer5: You put the axle in, you take the ball-bearing out...
isla.engineer6: Sometimes there's an elegant solution... sometimes.
isla.engineer7: I've got just the contraption for this!
isla.engineerloud4: Must go faster, must go faster.
isla.engineerloud5: Can't think with all that racket!
isla.disarm2: Let's throw a wrench in the works.
isla.disarm4: Construction, deconstruction... it's all the same, in the end.
isla.disarm5: A beautiful design. A shame I have to wreck it.
isla.disarm6: Traps are the arse end of engineering. No artisanship.
isla.disarmloud4: I'm just going to smack it with a wrench!
isla.disarmloud6: I can't even hear myself think!
isla.busy3: I'm in the middle of something.
isla.interrupt2: Aren't you supposed to defend your engineer?!
isla.interrupt4: I can't think when I'm under attack!
isla.combatstart2: Oh my, someone must do the fighting now.
isla.combatstart3: I hope you don't expect me to fight.
isla.combatstart4: A better plan would have avoided this.
isla.combatstart5: Not good. Not good at all!
isla.combatend5: They should have thought this through.
isla.loot2: If they cannot prevent us from taking it, it is ours.
isla.loot3: A good plan reaps its own rewards.
isla.loot5: I believe they call that loot.
isla.lootloud2: The plan was to get treasure before the alarm!
isla.lootloud3: Now's not the time for looting!
isla.lootloud4: We get nothing if the plan fails!
isla.lootloud5: Why are you doing that now?!
isla.alert1: We're at the limits of our plan now.
isla.alert2: This clock is on the verge of chiming...
isla.alert3: We can afford no more unanticipated variables.
isla.alert4: We will be detected if we are not careful.
isla.final2: Phase one complete. Acquire the treasure.
isla.final3: Remember, this is only the midpoint.
isla.final4: From the blueprints, I thought it'd be bigger.
isla.final5: I haven't even used half my contraptions yet!

karst.perception6: They're hiding something. I know it.
karst.busy5: Trying to concentrate on something else.
karst.interrupt2: Can't work while I'm gettin' hit.
karst.interrupt3: Any chance you could stop hitting me?
karst.combatstart1: Let you get this one, yeah?
karst.combatstart2: Who put you in a bad mood?
karst.combatstart4: Quick, before they make too much noise.
karst.combatend5: I got the best of ya.
karst.loot1: If you don't want it, I'll take it.
karst.loot3: Ehh, reckon I'll find something better.
karst.loot5: Plenty more where that came from, I reckon.
karst.alert3: You trying to get us caught?
karst.final1: Got us here safe 'n' sound, didn't I?
karst.final4: Almost there. Don't screw it up.
karst.final5: I think this is what we're here for.
karst.lockpickingloud5: I'll try to make it quick!
karst.lockpickingloud6: You do your job, I'll do mine!
karst.perceptionloud4: I can't see--... wait, what's that!?
karst.perceptionloud5: Horrible time to just be standing 'round!
karst.combatstartloud5: I'll fight you! I'll bloody do it, mate!
karst.lootloud2: I get it, but is now the best time!?
karst.lootloud3: Yeah, okay, I wouldn't have let that one go either!
karst.lootloud5: I better not die because you needed that!
karst.finalloud2: Get the bloody thing and let's move!
karst.finalloud4: Pocket the goods! We gotta go!

niles.objective1: Let's hope it's not too late!
niles.objective4: There must be some kind of way out of here!
niles.thaumaturgyloud4: Mind control is a delicate art!
niles.thaumaturgyloud5: I'll be as quick as I can!
niles.deception5: This should be easy. Should be.
niles.deception6: Just another form of mind control.
niles.busy5: You have no idea what you're doing, do you?
niles.combatstart5: I really don't want to get stabbed again.
niles.combatend3: No afterlife for them. A shame.
niles.combatend4: Thank God we survived. Wait, I didn't mean that!
niles.combatend7: All this gore reminds me of home.
niles.combatendloud4: It would seem our luck has not yet run out!
niles.loot2: Don't you owe me a few markers?
niles.loot3: Avarice is not entirely without merit.
niles.loot4: Not all treasure is silver and gold.
niles.lootloud1: Leave it, there are more important matters!
niles.lootloud2: Are you seriously doing that right now?
niles.alert1: You do know we're about to get caught?
niles.alert2: I sense suspicion. They may be on to us.
niles.alert3: To err is human, but one more mistake and we'll be ruined.
niles.final3: I half expected us not to make it this far.
niles.final4: There may be traps. You go first.
niles.finalloud3: Move like your life depends upon it!

gem_specials.endurancechargeonmeleestun: Endurance Charge on Melee Stun Support
